title: Foundations of Science Instructional Design Using Visual Learning Materials

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary pedagogical concepts and understanding of science curricula
context.additional_context: Course for pre-service/elementary teachers to master effective utilization of visual learning materials in microlearning environments accessible via smartphones

learning_goals: Learners can distinguish and apply at least three static/dynamic visualization formats appropriate for explaining scientific concepts
Learners analyze visualization material selection criteria based on learning objectives and assessment methods with at least 80% accuracy
Learners can design elementary-level science teaching materials using visualizations created in mobile environments

resources: Smartphone-Friendly Visualization Tools (e.g., Canva, PPT Mobile Version)
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
